comments:
While the envionment work some time it start to throw lots of out of memory 
exceptions. I have 1Gb memory and till now i don have this problem. in the log 
file I found huge exception stack thta looks like it ware looped (see the 
entry !ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 sty 03, 2005 10:33:57.649 in the given log 
report).
